name: Nexosys
description: A sleek, high-tech plasma weapon equipped with a neural interface module for enhanced targeting accuracy. The Nexosys combines advanced computational processing with a devastating plasma core to create an unyielding combat tool in a dystopian cyberpunk setting.

flavor.rationale: In a world consumed by technology and dystopian ruin, the Nexosys would be found among the scraps of abandoned systems, scavenged by those who scavenge for the edge of survival. Its neural interface module makes it particularly valuable for precision combat in high-stakes scenarios.
